meta_description: The Wolfsonian–FIU, located in the heart of the Art Deco District in Miami, is a museum, library and research center that uses its collection to illustrate the persuasive power of art and design.
hours_text:
* [Visit](index.html)
  * [Tours](tours/index.html)
  * [Accessibility](accessibility/index.html)
  * [Rentals](rentals/index.html)

  * [Bloomberg Connects](bloomberg-connects/index.html)

## Location + Phone

1001 Washington Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33139   
At the corner of 10th Street & Washington Avenue   
[305.531.1001](tel:3055311001)

## Hours

Monday–Tuesday | Closed  
Wednesday–Thursday | 10am–6pm  
Friday | 10am–9pm  
Saturday–Sunday | 10am–6pm

The library's reading room is open by appointment only:  
Monday–Friday | 9am–5pm  
Saturday | 11am–5:30pm

 _Holiday closings: New Year's Day, Martin Luther King Jr. Day, Memorial Day, Independence Day, Labor Day, Veterans Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas Eve, Christmas Day, New Year's Eve_

## Admission

Adults: $12  
Seniors, students with ID, and children 6–18: $8  
Members: FREE  
Florida residents: FREE  
Visitors with disabilities and their accompanying caregiver: FREE  
Children under 6: FREE  
Students, faculty, and staff of the State University System of Florida: FREE  
Active U.S. military and veterans (with ID): FREE

 _Free Fridays, 6–9pm every week_ __

## During Your Visit

### Visitor Guidelines

  * No food, drinks, or large bags.
  * Cashless Design Store transactions preferred.

### Accessibility

The Wolfsonian welcomes visitors of all ages and abilities. See our [Accessibility page](accessibility/index.html) for specifics on accommodations.

### Bloomberg Connects

accessibility_text:
# Accessibility

# Accessibility

  * [Visit](../index.html)
  * [Tours](../tours/index.html)
  * [Accessibility](index.html)
  * [Rentals](../rentals/index.html)
  * [Shop](../shop/index.html)
  * [Bloomberg Connects](../bloomberg-connects/index.html)

The Wolfsonian is committed to providing an inviting and accessible experience for visitors of all abilities.

  * **We provide complimentary admission** to visitors with disabilities and their accompanying caregivers.
  * **Trained service animals are welcome**. Pets and emotional support animals are not permitted inside the building.
  * **Closed captioning is available** in the galleries.

Should you need an ADA accommodation to participate in a University event, program, or activity or need to request materials in an accessible format, please contact FIU's Office of Civil Rights Compliance and Accessibility (CRCA) at [305.348.2785](tel:3053482785) or [accommodations@fiu.edu](mailto:accommodations@fiu.edu). All requests for ADA accommodation or accessible materials must be submitted to CRCA at least seven (7) business days prior to the event or at the earliest possible opportunity.

## Parking

  * Visitor Drop-off/Pick-up

Individual visitors may arrange for temporary drop-off or pick-up at the City of Miami Beach Municipal Lot P13, located at 1000 Washington Avenue, directly across from the museum.

  * Accessible Parking

Visitors with valid disabled person parking permits can park for free at all on-street meters, in mu...
